title: Honey, pears and madeleines
description: Wonderfully light madeleines with sweet poached pears make a sophisticated afternoon tea or dessert.Equipment: You will need a madeleine tray.
ingredients: 85g/3oz unsalted butter, plus 1 tbsp melted butter for brushing
85g/3oz plain white flour, plus extra for dusting
2 pears, peeled and cut into small dice
